subject: 蓝精灵们在山巅玩耍
detail: Animated style, a group of small blue-skinned Smurfs playing joyfully on a mountain peak: first they leap playfully one by one, then dart swiftly between treetops like shimmering sparks, finally gathering together atop the mist-shrouded summit, surrounded by drifting clouds and twinkling stars; background features a vast sea of clouds and floating whimsical mushrooms, soft golden-hour light with gentle volumetric glow; camera orbits smoothly around the scene in a full 360-degree cinematic loop; background sound: cheerful laughter and delicate jingling bells. Voiceover says in Chinese "他们每天在山上快乐地玩耍".
image_detail: (动画风格) 一群青蓝色皮肤的小精灵在山巅树梢间跳跃，背景是漫天云海和漂浮的蘑菇
narration: 他们每天在山上快乐地玩耍
